revised_title: On Autopolar Polyhedra and Their Enumeration
tldr: The author investigates autopolar polyhedra, which are polyhedra where any type or description remains unchanged when summits are replaced with faces and vice versa. The paper explores the enumeration of autopolar polyhedra, focusing on the number of autopolar (r+2)-edra and (r+3)-edra that can be generated from an (r+1)-edral pyramid.
